column3: “I have PTSD, with that being said, F all that if you have anxiety crap. It did me well and I have anxiety out the wazoo lmao. seriously, nice lift, made me feel like a slice of butter melting on hotcakes lmfao”
“Really strong strain!! Not for first time Smokers :)”
“lemme get this shit in AZ SOMEHOW!”

“damn good smoke, not for the first timers as mentioned above. Another dank strain from the Spanish breeders. smooth and sweet smoke similar to the original nyc diesel. very intense strong high and immidiate onset.”
“Nice Indica Hybrid very Sour taste strong Effect !m”
“They call it acid for a reason! Expect a rush of creative thought followed by a killer body buzz. Very dank”
“Smooth smoke from the tip to the lungs, don't believe that, if you have anxiety" crap
column4: I have PTSD and high anxiety yet
column5: this strain made me feel great. everything was something to smile at. lmao. thanks whoever came up with this strain”"

column3: “Strong weed, Start with a good uplift and after 30-60 minutes it goes in your body.”
“Very colourful and dense. Smells Sweet. High is not as rewarding as the appeal. Very beautiful”
“Turned out great just a little small compared to other autos from paradise. Great plant overall”
“70/30.  Medium strength. Creative and energetic. Didn't like the taste.”

“Powerful. 

I tend to get a little nausea.  I get headaches if I have a lot. I feel euphoric, goofy, and happy. I have lots more energy even when I’m sitting still. I’m prone to anxiousness and this does not cause any anxiousness in me.”
“Mmmmmmm TASTY. Very strong, hit me like a truck... but in a nice way. Mega Munchies”
“Strong and potent! First time smokers be careful lol”
“melts my brain”
“Good for day time. Definitely for the creatives out there. The high doesn’t last very long though”

“This strain looked verry neutral, not so shiny but na nice green color. when opening the bag i smelled bettef then it looked.. and when smoked.. the diesel/gassy small was verry clear! You have to like the taste but i'll do so its pretty tastefull to smoke. 
About the high, i'm smoking this hud right now so i'm getting there.. feels like its going to be a potent strain!”
“amazing, relaxing and creative buzz.”
“Really tasty”

“very potent like suggested from everyone on here already. i was pretty standoffish because of the name and that i thought it was mislabeled(LSD was the strain i was thinking of). none- of-the-less i got it anyways. at 40% thc, no lie, i was freakin' blown away. its a definite indy-hybrid for sure and i was so relaxed watching a documentary on netflix that i only stopped at a hit, nothing more and honestly, i didn't n...”
“I'm usually smoke everyday throughout the day and this strain still knocked me on my ass but yet I was so creative and clear headed. Buy this strain”
“auto Acid is easy to grow and very power efect, 10week flow and 45day curing you can start!”
“Nice and relaxing, if you need a slow down" that remains even
column4: look no further. Definitely one that I would use to conduct buzzniss with in the future.”"

column3: “Just trying this strain. Was looking for something more earthy tasting and it nailed it! Then the body high was great as well! Love this strain!”

“Wow. As an experienced cannabis user, this strain initially caught me off guard. It didn't look the most sexy, but it was dense & pungent as hell. Definitely indica dominant, and super tasty, a light froot loop scent from it. Nice lung squeeze effect which comes from mostly indicas.”
“lemme get this shit in AZ SOMEHOW!”

“One of THE best strains I've smoked next to Larry og. Very strong and not for the weak. I'm and experienced smoker and me and my friend tapped out halfway through the blunt. Amazing head feeling and makes you very creative.”

“Incredible strain, sometimes she gets a little tall but large buds dense and full. I pictures of my runs somewhere's. love the taste, the high everything. Smooth if flushed well and dried even. it has a acid citrus flavor sometimes more to the grapefruit side or the acidic flavor of lemons and pine taste. 
Been running it for a while now and will continue as long as I can.”
